Public shouldn t be worried about stricter implementation of ECQ -- AFP spox Arevalo tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-735054 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/735054/public-shouldn-t-be-worried-about-stricter-implementation-of-ecq-afp-spox-arevalo/story/ "Wala pong dapat ikabahala ang ating mga kababayan sapagkat sa totoo lang ang inyong Armed Forces ay sanay sa pagpapatupad ng martial law dito sa Mindanao pero itong sinasabi sa Metro Manila, hindi naman ito martial law kung hindi strict implementation ng quarantine," military spokesperson Brigadier General Edgard Arevalo said. Wed, 22 Apr 2020 08:13:12 +0800
Soldiers to help implement social distancing in Pasay barangay tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-735053 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/metro/735053/soldiers-to-help-implement-social-distancing-in-pasay-barangay/story/ Soldiers were deployed to Pasay City's Barangay 178 Maricaban on Wednesday morning to help authorities there enforce social distancing amid the COVID-19 threat. Wed, 22 Apr 2020 08:11:02 +0800
Diarrhea kills 2, downs 42 in Maguindanao tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-735051 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/735051/diarrhea-kills-2-downs-42-in-maguindanao/story/ COTABATO CITY -- Two people died and another 42 were being monitored after suffering from diarrhea on an island village in Parang, Maguindanao, according to health ministry of Bangsamoro Autonomous Region in Muslim Mindanao (BARMM). Wed, 22 Apr 2020 07:47:35 +0800

Wed, 22 Apr 2020 06:41:55 +0800
Global COVID-19 cases exceed 2.5M mark while death toll rise to more than 174,000 tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-735042 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/world/735042/global-covid-19-cases-exceed-2-5m-mark-while-death-toll-rise-to-more-than-174-000/story/ There are more than 2,500,000 persons infected with the virus that causes coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) while about 174,001 have died. The extent of the dire effects of the pandemic has moved an official of the UN World Food Programme to warn of a humanitarian catastrophe. Wed, 22 Apr 2020 05:56:55 +0800
'Minuscule traces' of virus in non-potable Paris water - city official tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-735041 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/world/735041/minuscule-traces-of-virus-in-non-potable-paris-water-city-official/story/ "Minuscule traces" of the new coronavirus have been found in Paris's non-potable water -- such as the supply used for cleaning streets -- but drinking water is at no risk of contamination, a city official said Sunday. Wed, 22 Apr 2020 05:23:49 +0800
Victim toll in Canada's worst mass shooting rises to 23 - police tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-735040 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/world/735040/victim-toll-in-canada-s-worst-mass-shooting-rises-to-23-police/story/ The victim toll from the worst mass shooting in Canadian history has risen to 23 from previously reported 19, federal police said in a statement on Tuesday. Wed, 22 Apr 2020 04:58:02 +0800

Lalaki sa Gumaca, Quezon, isinauli ang sobrang cash assistance na nakuha sa gobyerno tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-735032 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/ulatfilipino/735032/lalaki-sa-gumaca-quezon-isinauli-ang-sobrang-cash-assistance-na-nakuha-sa-gobyerno/story/ Laking suwerte ng isang lalaki sa Gumaca, Quezon, na bukod sa perang ayudang nakuha sa programang 4Ps ay nakatanggap pa siya ng pera mula sa Social Amelioration Program (SAP). Pero ang lalaki, naging tapat at isinauli ang sobrang ayuda na nakuha sa gobyerno. Wed, 22 Apr 2020 00:34:17 +0800
Philippine aircraft lands in China for $2.5-M COVID-19 equipment tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-735030 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/735030/philippine-aircraft-lands-in-china-for-2-5-m-covid-19-equipment/story/ A Philippine Air Force C130 cargo plane has landed at Shenzhen, China to pick up COVID-19 laboratory equipment worth $2.5M, the Department of Health (DOH) said Tuesday. Wed, 22 Apr 2020 00:25:50 +0800
Mga OFW sa Italy, nagre-repack at paghahatid ng relief goods sa kanilang mga kapwa-Pilipino tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-735029 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/ulatfilipino/735029/mga-ofw-sa-italy-nagre-repack-at-paghahatid-ng-relief-goods-sa-kanilang-mga-kapwa-pilipino/story/ Buhay na buhay ang bayanihan ng mga Pilipino sa Italy, kung saan ilang overseas Filipino worker (OFW) doon ang nagre-repack ng relief goods at inihahatid mismo sa kanilang mga kababayan na hindi makalabas ng mga bahay at apektado ang hanapbuhay dahil sa umiiral na lockdown bunga ng COVID-19. Wed, 22 Apr 2020 00:07:29 +0800

Tue, 21 Apr 2020 23:59:31 +0800
Pamilyang nakatanggap ng P6,700 na ayuda, ipinampuhunan sa droga ang pera? tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-735025 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/ulatfilipino/735025/pamilyang-nakatanggap-p6-700k-na-ayuda-ipinam-buy-and-sell-ng-droga-ang-pera/story/ Arestado ang isang magkakaanak sa Quezon City dahil sa pagtutulak umano ng droga. Hinala ng pulisya, ipinampuhunan ng mga suspek ang natanggap na ayudang P6,700 sa pagtutulak ng droga kung saan nakumpiska sa kanila ang shabu na nagkakahalaga ng P34,000. Tue, 21 Apr 2020 23:33:31 +0800
